title: Warrior Love: Silas Loves Lili Weirdly Lili Loves Silas
description: The crime mystery Warrior Love centers around solving the murder of a professional darts competitor, and sabotaging a mayoral election. The essence of the novel is about people's capacity for good and evil, and their motivations. The very core of the book is a pure love story between two "warriors", Silas and LiLi, each trying to save the other, and the world, from perdition.
author: Stephen Foehr
